user_question: How can I secure my IoT devices at home from cyber threats?
final_answer: To secure your IoT devices at home, you should: 1) Change default passwords to strong, unique ones. 2) Regularly update device firmware. 3) Use a separate network for IoT devices. 4) Enable network encryption. 5) Disable unnecessary features and services.
